passive.name: Pacify
passive.description: Every time an ally attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Cantillation. Each stack of Cantillation increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>, stacking up to {{2}} time(s). When the wearer uses their Ultimate, removes Cantillation and gains Cadenza. Cadenza increases the Wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> and increases all allies' DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{5}} turn(s).
